<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Security Groups</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances/{instance_id}/list_security_groups"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve a list of security groups associated with the specified instance.
